CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 4) = "1.12", "05 - Operations/Administration", IF (LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 5) = "10.17", "03 - Information Technology", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "1.", "01 - Elected Official/Legislative", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "2.", "02 - Finance/Procurement/Budget/Auditor", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "3.", "03 - Information Technology", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "4.", "04 - Engineering/Technical", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "6.", "06 - Human Resource/Workforce/Training/Benefits", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "7.", "07 - First Responder (Police/Fire/EMS)", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "8.", "07 - First Responder (Police/Fire/EMS)", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "9.", "09 - Marketing/Sale", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 3) = "99.", "99 - Other", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 2) = "5.", "05 - Operations/Administration", IF( LEFT(TEXT(Primary_Job_Function_Detail__c), 3) = "10.", "10 - Education/Library Services", "" )))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Demo Job Function
